pkgmetadata.longdescription: PodGen======This module can be used to easily generate Podcasts. It is designed so youdon't need to read up on how RSS and iTunes functions â€“ it just works!See the documentation at http://podgen.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ for moreinformation.It is licensed under the terms of both the FreeBSD license and the LGPLv3+.Choose the one which is more convenient for you. For more details have a lookat license.bsd and license.lgpl.
